bill.summary:
Inflation Working Group Act
This bill establishes the U.S. Working Group on Inflation in Congress. The group must investigate the recent causes of elevated inflation and the relationships between inflation and gross domestic product growth, the labor market, poverty, crime, and other societal factors. The group must publish a report on their investigation and provide recommendations for actions to mitigate sustained inflation.
